H0.text: Irradiating food is the research area that has the greatest impact on the environment.

H1.text: Organic fertilizers research has the greatest impact on the environment among the areas listed.

H2.text: Bacteria to clean up oil spills is the research area that has the greatest impact on the environment.

H3.text: Developing larger, sweeter strawberries is a research area that has the greatest impact on the environment.

A4.text: Populations of bacteria and archaea were used to rejuvenate the coast after the oil spill.

A5.text: In comparison to conventional physicochemical treatment methods bioremediation may offer advantages as it aims to be sustainable, eco-friendly, cheap, and scalable.
